name: Andrew Heinrich
goal: I am a student pursuing a degree in law. I am particularly interested in international law and in international organizations. I am working on research related to international organizations, particularly in comparative work of policies in different regional organizations.
interests: Education and training, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Migration and asylum, Public Health
euInitiatives: I am eager to observe meetings at European Parliament so that I may pursue comparative studies of initiatives carried out by the European Parliament relative to those carried out by other regional organizations.
